lore.text: 贅沢に金で作られたブーツ。
カツンと上品な音が響く。

functions.tag: {ui:{smithable:1b,upgrade:[[{count:5,Slot:12b,id:"nautilus_shell",components:{"item_model":"resource:loot/gold_shards","custom_model_data":1006,"custom_data":{ui:{item_type:"blank"}},"item_name":'{"color":"white","text":"金の欠片"}',"lore":['[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"錬精された金の小さな欠片。"}]','[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"見た目も美しく使いやすい。"}]']}},{count:1,Slot:13b,id:"nautilus_shell",components:{"item_model":"resource:loot/gold","custom_model_data":1007,"custom_data":{ui:{item_type:"blank"}},"item_name":'{"color":"#6FE58D","text":"金"}',"lore":['[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"希少なわけではないが特別"}]','[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"価値が高いとされている。"}]']}}],[{count:7,Slot:12b,id:"nautilus_shell",components:{"item_model":"resource:loot/gold_shards","custom_model_data":1006,"custom_data":{ui:{item_type:"blank"}},"item_name":'{"color":"white","text":"金の欠片"}',"lore":['[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"錬精された金の小さな欠片。"}]','[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"見た目も美しく使いやすい。"}]']}},{count:2,Slot:13b,id:"nautilus_shell",components:{"item_model":"resource:loot/gold","custom_model_data":1007,"custom_data":{ui:{item_type:"blank"}},"item_name":'{"color":"#6FE58D","text":"金"}',"lore":['[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"希少なわけではないが特別"}]','[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"価値が高いとされている。"}]']}}],[{count:10,Slot:12b,id:"nautilus_shell",components:{"item_model":"resource:loot/gold_shards","custom_model_data":1006,"custom_data":{ui:{item_type:"blank"}},"item_name":'{"color":"white","text":"金の欠片"}',"lore":['[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"錬精された金の小さな欠片。"}]','[{"text":"","color":"gray","italic":false},{"text":"見た目も美しく使いやすい。"}]']}},{count:3,Slot:13b,id:"nautilus_shell",components:{"item_model":"resource:loot/gold","custom_model_data":1007,"custom_data":{ui:{item_type:"blank"}},"item_name":'{"color":"#6FE58D","text":"金"}',"lore":['[{"text":"","co
